monsterSenses: Senses blindsight 30 ft. (blind beyond this radius)
monsterSpecials: False Appearance. While the shrieker remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from an ordinary fungus.
monsterActions: Shriek. When bright light or a creature is within 30 feet of the shrieker, it emits a shriek audible within 300 feet of it. The shrieker continues to shriek until the disturbance moves out of range and for 1d4 of the shrieker's turns afterward
